quote: Only through focus can you do world-class things, no matter how capable you are
author: Bill Gates

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Focus like a laser, not a flashlight
author: Michael Jordan

quote: If you chase two rabbits, both will escape
author: Russian proverb

quote: Infinite shiny objects, finite time
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Where your focus goes, your energy flows.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Focus is more important than intelligence.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Starve your distractions, feed your focus.
author: Unknown

quote: The successful person has the habit of doing the things failures don't like to do.
author: Albert E. N. Gray

quote: Clarity about your goal breeds laser-like focus.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Focus on what to do next.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Focus is the art of knowing what to ignore.
author: James Clear

quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You get what you focus on, so focus on what you want.
author: Unknown

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Focusing on one thing can move mountains.
author: Jay Shetty

quote: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sunâ€™s rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Focus means eliminating distractions, not working harder.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Success demands singleness of purpose.
author: Vince Lombardi
